variable.name: DBName
variable.description: Connection String Database Name

variable.name: DBPWD
variable.description: Connection String Password

variable.name: DBUID
variable.description: Connection String User ID, Leave Blank For Integrated Security

variable.name: ServerName
variable.description: Connection String Database Server Name

variable.name: CopyReport
variable.description: Switch That Determines If An Output File Is Created.

variable.name: Days
variable.description: Number Of Days To Report On. Needs To Be A Negative Number.

variable.name: OutputFolder
variable.description: Folder Where The Output File Is Copied. Needs To Be A Local Folder, Or Share Accessable By "Everyone".

variable.name: PackageName
variable.description: Name Of The SSIS Package To Report On.
